pages.text: The $(mob)Ender Dragon$() is a boss that guards the $(thing)End$(). It flies around the main island and attacks trespassers on sight. Any harm done to it is quickly healed by the $(item)End Crystals$() on top of the various $(item)Obsidian$() pillars, which need to be destroyed first.$(p)It can dive at its targets, dealing damage on impact, or fire fireballs that leave a damage area where they land.
$(item)Dragon Breath$() can be collected by using $(item)Glass Bottles$() on the damage areas left by its fireballs. It can be used to brew $(item)Lingering Potions$().

On its death, the $(mob)Ender Dragon$() opens a portal back to the $(thing)Overworld$(), a portal to the outer islands and leaves behind a $(item)Dragon Egg$(). The latter is purely decorative and can be kept as a trophy.$(p)Placing 4 $(item)End Crystals$() around the $(thing)Overworld$() portal will ressurect the $(mob)Ender Dragon$().
